nodes.documentation:
Emitted when `value` tokens are moved from one account (`from`) to
another (`to`).
     * Note that `value` may be zero.
nodes.name: Transfer

nodes.documentation: Emitted when the user submit an appeal.
nodes.name: Appeal

nodes.documentation: Emitted when the user user deposit money.
nodes.name: Deposit

nodes.documentation: Emitted when the user withdraw money.
nodes.name: Withdraw

nodes.documentation:
User deposit money to the system, system select a worker then send the money to it.
Then record the amount to the user's account.
If the user's withdrawn account has money, he can't deposit.
Emits a {Deposit} event.
nodes.name: deposit

nodes.documentation:
User withdraw money. The system select a worker and emit a Event to notify it.
Move the withdrawn money to the withdrawn account, wait until the worker refund.
If the user's appeal account has money, he can't withdraw.
Emits a {Withdraw} event.
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
When the user's withdrawn account has money, 
and the block height minus withdrawn height greater than 6, 
the user can submit an appeal.
Emits an {Appeal} event.
nodes.name: appeal

nodes.documentation: Returns the amount of balance owned by `account`.
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation: Returns the amount of withdrawn balance owned by `account`.
nodes.name: getWithdrawnBalance

nodes.documentation: Returns the amount of appealed balance owned by `account`.
nodes.name: getAppealedBalance

nodes.documentation: Returns the amount of interest owned by `account`.
nodes.name: getInterest

nodes.documentation:
Moves `amount` tokens from the caller's account to `recipient`.
Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
     * Emits a {Transfer} event.
nodes.name: transfer

attributes.documentation:
Emitted when `value` tokens are moved from one account (`from`) to
another (`to`).
     * Note that `value` may be zero.
attributes.name: Transfer

attributes.name: Appeal

attributes.documentation: Emitted when the user user deposit money.
attributes.name: Deposit

attributes.documentation: Emitted when the user withdraw money.
attributes.name: Withdraw

User deposit money to the system, system select a worker then send the money to it.
Then record the amount to the user's account.
If the user's withdrawn account has money, he can't deposit.
Emits a {Deposit} event.
attributes.name: deposit

User withdraw money. The system select a worker and emit a Event to notify it.
Move the withdrawn money to the withdrawn account, wait until the worker refund.
If the user's appeal account has money, he can't withdraw.
Emits a {Withdraw} event.

When the user's withdrawn account has money, 
and the block height minus withdrawn height greater than 6, 
the user can submit an appeal.
Emits an {Appeal} event.
attributes.name: appeal

attributes.documentation: Returns the amount of balance owned by `account`.
attributes.name: balanceOf

attributes.documentation: Returns the amount of withdrawn balance owned by `account`.
attributes.name: getWithdrawnBalance

attributes.documentation: Returns the amount of appealed balance owned by `account`.
attributes.name: getAppealedBalance

attributes.documentation: Returns the amount of interest owned by `account`.
attributes.name: getInterest

attributes.documentation:
Moves `amount` tokens from the caller's account to `recipient`.
Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
     * Emits a {Transfer} event.
attributes.name: transfer

appeal().notice: When the user's withdrawn account has money,  and the block height minus withdrawn height greater than 6,  the user can submit an appeal. Emits an {Appeal} event.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the amount of balance owned by `account`.

deposit().notice: User deposit money to the system, system select a worker then send the money to it. Then record the amount to the user's account. If the user's withdrawn account has money, he can't deposit. Emits a {Deposit} event.

getAppealedBalance(address).notice: Returns the amount of appealed balance owned by `account`.

getInterest(address).notice: Returns the amount of interest owned by `account`.

getWithdrawnBalance(address).notice: Returns the amount of withdrawn balance owned by `account`.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Moves `amount` tokens from the caller's account to `recipient`. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.     * Emits a {Transfer} event.

withdraw(uint256).notice: User withdraw money. The system select a worker and emit a Event to notify it. Move the withdrawn money to the withdrawn account, wait until the worker refund. If the user's appeal account has money, he can't withdraw. Emits a {Withdraw} event.
